field.name: summary
field.value: Change GetFilterType implementation to only look for IViewFilters in the view assembly's referenced assemblies

field.name: description
field.value:
See here:
http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-users/browse_thread/thread/414f12f54bbac97c
for complete description.
Note: Introduced breaking change with this patch. Assemblies referenced in AspView configuration section should use the assembly name now instead of the assembly file name.
So, this will not work:
<reference assembly="MyAssembly.dll" /> <reference assembly="System.Core.dll" isFromGac="true" />
It should be replaced with this:
<reference assembly="MyAssembly" /> <reference assembly="System.Core, Version=3.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=B77A5C561934E089" />
